title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 541.0 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 541.0 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

This Part contains regulations governing procedures to be
followed when a defendant is found not criminally responsible because of mental
disease or defect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
541.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
